column5: I got a call from a previous client wanting to get out again with his wife and youngest son.  We decided on Couchiching and got out around 4pm for a half day charter.  It was hot and calm, but the fish were biting.  Landed 17 bass in 4 hours, here's some of the days largest.  All fish were released following photos.      Fish were caught on 5 inch flippin tubes with a 5/16oz bullet head and 3/0 Owner Riggin hook.  Milfoil beds in 8-14 feet of water.
man that last bass is a fatty! nice job
Wow that is a nice spread of bass. Good job!
Nice guiding Steve.  Their smiles say it all.
Largemouth lovin. You really got em good. Nice job !
